name: Ni Show Product Name In Orders Tab Of My Account Page For WooCommerce
author: anzia

sections.description:
Show product name in my account page in order tab. added the new columns to show the all order product name with quantity in woocommerce my account page in order tab.

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

Users are fully responsible for their own use.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni Show Product Name In Orders Tab Of My Account Page For WooCommerce” plugin from admin panel.
  3. Go to my account page in order tab and find column “Product | Quantity”.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email:support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
